about.details:
Incorporated in 1989, Marco Cables & Conductors Limited is engaged in the business of manufacturing and selling wires, cable wires, and conductors in India.

The company's product list includes:

  1. LT Aerial Bunched Cables: It is used for overhead Power Distribution. It provides high safety and reliability, lower power losses, and ultimate system economy by reducing installation, maintenance, and operating costs, best for installation in difficult terrains such as hilly areas forest areas, coastal areas, etc.
  2. LT PVC Cables.
  3. AAAC Conductor: Made from aluminum-magnesium-silicon alloy of high electrical conductivity containing Magnesium (0.6-0.9%) and silicon (0.5-0.9%) to give it better mechanical properties after treatment.
  4. LT XLPE Cables: These are manufactured with CU/AI Conductor with XLPE Insulation, Laid up, Inner Taped/Extruded. The armoring is of galvanized mild steel wires/strips. The final outer sheath with high-grade PVC. All are as per relevant IS specifications.
  5. ACSR Conductors: ACSR conductor consists of a solid or stranded steel core surrounded by strands of aluminum (E.C. GRADE). ACSR Conductor is available in a wide range of steel, containing carbon from 0.5% to 0.85 %. ACSR Conductor has high Tensile Strength making it useful for for river crossings, overhead ground wires, installations involving extra long spans, etc.

Marco Cables & Conductors' manufacturing unit is located at Nasik, Maharashtra, with a combined installed production capacity of 18,000 Kms p.a. as of August 07, 2023.

The company recorded Rs. 5,676.79 Lacs, Rs. 5,641.00 Lacs, and Rs. 4,239.18 Lacs in revenue from operations in fiscal 2023, 2022, and 2021 respectively.

faqs.question: What is the Marco Cables & Conductors IPO?
faqs.answer:
Marco Cables & Conductors IPO is a SME IPO of 5202000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹18.73 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹36 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 21, 2023, and closes on September 25, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Marco Cables & Conductors IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Marco Cables & Conductors IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Marco Cables & Conductors IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Marco Cables & Conductors IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Marco Cables & Conductors IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Marco Cables & Conductors IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Marco Cables & Conductors IPO opens on September 21, 2023 and closes on September 25, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Marco Cables & Conductors IPO?
faqs.answer: Marco Cables & Conductors IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Marco Cables & Conductors IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Marco Cables & Conductors IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Marco Cables & Conductors IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Marco Cables & Conductors IPO will be done on Thursday, September 28, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, October 3, 2023. Check the Marco Cables & Conductors IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Marco Cables & Conductors IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Marco Cables & Conductors IPO listing date is on Thursday, September 28, 2023.
